title: AI Education Article
description: Act like a pro content writer. Write an inspiring and informative 800-word article on AI in Education; output as DOCX.
prompt:
<prompt>
  <title>AI Education Article</title>
  <role>Act like a pro content writer</role>
  <task>Write a high-quality article on the given topic</task>

  <request>
    <task>WriteArticle</task>
    <topic>AI in Education</topic>
    <length unit="words">800</length>
    <tone>Inspiring and informative</tone>
    <output format="docx"/>
  </request>
</prompt>
